data.title: Chie Kōjiro
data.meta_description: (神代 知衣, Kōjiro Chie?, October 17, 1960) is a Japanese voice actress from Shimonoseki, Yamaguchi. She was previously affiliated with Mausu Promotion and Production Baobab, and is now affiliated with 81 Produce. She is a Japanese voice of Lisa…
data.text:
Chie Kōjiro (神代 知衣, Kōjiro Chie?, October 17, 1960) is a Japanese voice actress from Shimonoseki, Yamaguchi. She was previously affiliated with Mausu Promotion and Production Baobab, and is now affiliated with 81 Produce.

She is a Japanese voice of Lisa Simpson.

Contents

1 Roles

1.1 Television animation

1.2 Video games

1.3 Dubbing roles

2 External links
